channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Loving Pablo
channel.desc: Action 2017 Virginia Vallejo, Colombia's most celebrated journalist, interviews Pablo Escobar, the infamous drug kingpin she becomes passionately involved with, even as his illegal operations plunge the country into chaos. Javier Bardem, Penelope Cruz, Peter Sarsgaard, Julieth Restrepo, ?scar Jaenada, Fernando Leon de Aranoa , Fernando Leon de Aranoa , Fernando Leon de Aranoa, Fernando Leon de Aranoa, Oscar Jaenada.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Pretty Woman
channel.desc: Romance 1990 Edward is a sophisticated businessman specializing in law. Fate let him meet Vivian, a Los Angeles prostitute who struggled with life to pay the rent. On a business trip, they meet each other and fall in love, although they are completely different. Richard Gere, Julia Roberts, Jason Alexander, Laura San Giacomo, Ralph Bellamy, Garry Marshall, J.F. Lawton.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: Emirates News
channel.desc: Investigation Exciting and humane local news are given coverage, with a range of the latest breaking news and reports on business, entertainment, lifestyle, sports, weather, real estate, and more. Ramia Farrage, Graham Clews, Yunus Saif, Greg Fairlie.

channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: DXB Today
channel.desc: Fashion Presenters dive into the various facets of life in Dubai, reviewing reports from lifestyle and fashion trends to the latest news, where they also have exclusive interviews with celebrities.
